document.full_text: detroit is the eighth n.h.l. team to erase a 3-0 series deficit, and on thursday in san jose it is seeking to become the fourth to win the series.
document.title: good news for detroit: it's been done
lines_and_colors: detroit is the eighth n.h.l. team to erase a 3-0 series deficit, and on thursday in san jose it is seeking to become the fourth to win the series.
